attributes.action: direct central government resources to the employment of litter wardens with the power to fine those dropping litter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Litter is making the United Kingdom one of the filthest countries in the developed world. Significant tax payers' resources are spent tidying up after people; these resources should be redirected to tackling the cause, that is, those thoughtlessly dropping litter. Litter wardens with the power to fine and discourage this anti-social behaviour in other ways should be introduced.
